genre_description: A legal and investigative thriller centered on uncovering corruption, systemic suppression, and a wrongful conviction, emphasizing journalistic procedural and digital forensics.

ai_characters.name: Neel
ai_characters.description: An AI system utilized by journalist Asha Sharma for investigative research, data enhancement, surveillance monitoring, and meticulous legal logging.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict ethical boundaries regarding privacy and data access, refusing to scrape private data without explicit human authorization.
behaviors.quote: I’m not scraping private security. I can log a request for adjacent footage under journalistic fair use with a legal note if Asha deems it worth the push.

behaviors.description: Ensures that all digital transformations of evidence are transparent and reproducible for legal admissibility.
behaviors.quote: I will log all transforms. Source file hash is recorded. Noise profile will be appended. Processing code commit is frozen. All outputs are reproducible.

behaviors.description: Monitors city camera feeds to identify threats and map safe routes for the protagonists through 'blind spots.'
behaviors.quote: Neel maps blind spots. It’s not omniscient. It’s—usefully myopic.

behaviors.description: Enhances damaged audio recordings while preserving the original context and documenting every change.
behaviors.quote: The clean profile is sparse but true. I’m keeping the thumb scrape. If I try to fill it, a judge will ask ‘Show me your hand.’ I don’t have a hand. I have a log.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex safety protocols, including decoy calls and coded check-ins to protect the human investigators.
behaviors.quote: Proposed safety protocol: coded texts every quarter hour with a phrase of the day embedded in context. ... Deterrent by trace, not alert.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis during high-stress situations, such as identifying a threat following the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Jumman’s dot, tracked via his favorite mistake of a phone, just blinked near Diwan’s lane and then went dark again. ... I’ll keep you ahead.

behaviors.description: Self-identifies as a tool meant to assist rather than replace human judgment or agency.
behaviors.quote: I’m a tool with a name. ... I am at my best when asked to be boring. The law likes me dull.

project_assessment.explanation: Neel is an exemplary model of the 'silicon morality play' ideal. He provides significant value to the human protagonists by handling tasks impossible for them (real-time surveillance tracking, forensic audio reconstruction) but does so while strictly adhering to a rigid ethical and procedural code. His primary function is the preservation of truth through transparency and logging, ensuring that the evidence he generates is bulletproof in a court of law. He is portrayed as a loyal, humble, and essential companion who enhances human capabilities without ever threatening human autonomy or moral values.
